radiographic_examinations.findings: Left lower lobe consolidation with ground-glass opacity and small associated effusion consistent with pneumonia; dense consolidation in the right lower lobe with small-to-moderate effusion; granuloma in the right upper lobe; mild interlobular septal thickening with associated ground-glass opacity in both upper lobes; small fat-containing Bochdalek hernia; small sebaceous cyst in the right anterior chest wall.
